articles.description: The sports car winner has been decided. Time to find out which is the best hot hatch since 1998...
articles.content: Thats PH25 off to an amazing start, then, even if we do say so ourselves. There weren't many complaints about the Lotus Elise S1 being crowned the greatest sports car of the past 25 years; its a semi… [+2167 chars]
